armor.name: Shield
armor.description: Primitive or riot shield. Grants AC 13 or +1 if AC is already higher. Blocks first melee Shock each round.

armor.name: Leather Jacks
armor.description: Thick hides, quilted armor. Useless against TL4 weapons.

armor.name: Cuirass
armor.description: Brigandine, linothorax, half-plate. Useless against TL4 weapons.

armor.name: Full Plate
armor.description: Layered mail. Useless against TL4 weapons.

armor.name: Warpaint
armor.description: Scrap-built gang armor. +1 Morale for meaningful wearers.

armor.name: Armored Undersuit
armor.description: Skin-tight bodysuit. Not detectable without tactile examination.

armor.name: Secure Clothing
armor.description: Fashionable armor. Only detectable by tactile examination.

armor.name: Armored Vacc Suit
armor.description: Up-armored vacc suit. Half normal tear chance from edged weapons.

armor.name: Deflector Array
armor.description: Force field nodes. Flares bright blue when deflecting attacks.

armor.name: Blast Shield
armor.description: Reinforced ballistic shield. Grants AC 16 or +2 if AC is already higher. Blocks first ranged Shock each round.

armor.name: Force Pavis
armor.description: Pretech force shield. Grants AC 15 or +1 if AC is already higher. Blocks first melee Shock each round.

armor.name: Security Armor
armor.description: Standard law enforcement armor with rigid plates.

armor.name: Woven Body Armor
armor.description: Best TL3 armor or heavy-duty TL4 response team gear.

armor.name: Icarus Harness
armor.description: CFU with gravity damper for unlimited falls. Functions as vacc suit for 30 min.

armor.name: Vestimentum
armor.description: Ceremonial armor with microforce fields. Immune to primitive weapons.

armor.name: Assault Suit
armor.description: Advanced armor with integral comms, low-light/IR vision, energy feed. Requires Type B cell for 24h. Immune to primitive weapons.

armor.name: Storm Armor
armor.description: Assault suit + exo-augments (+4 STR for enc), gravitic boosters (20m leaps), auto-stabilization. Immune to primitive weapons.

armor.name: Field Emitter Panoply
armor.description: Pretech damper fields. All storm armor benefits, no power needed. Immune to lethal radiation.
